page.title: 11School Day 10.30am.-12.00pm.
page.content: At 10.30 we have a break until 10.45 and we are able to buy crisps from the school secretary. After play I like to do any writing that I have to do in my story or project book. Sometimes I also have to do word building and comprehension work.In my story book I write stories and poems, I enjoy doing this. In my project book I write about the project we are doing as well as do diagrams and drawings eg. When I was investigating snails I wrote and recorded the results of tests to see whether snails moved better on some surfaces compared to others. Some mornings we also have movement in the hall and just before we finish for lunch our teacher reads us some poems. We have to go home for lunch because the teachers have withdrawn their goodwill over a pay claim.
